spirit:component.spirit:name: aurora_8b10b

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: user_clk_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: user_clk frequency depends on line rate and this clock is available when shared logic is in IP

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: sync_clk_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: sync_clk frequency depends on line rate and this clock is available when shared logic is in IP

xilinx:isEnabled.xilinx:dependency: ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.supportlevel'))=false) and ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="kintex7") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="kintex7l") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="qkintex7") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="qkintex7l") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="qvirtex7") or ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="zynq") and ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_DEVICE'))!="xc7z012s") and (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_DEVICE'))!="xc7z015") and (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_DEVICE'))!="xc7z015i"))) or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="qzynq") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="azynq") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="virtex7")))

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: reset
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Active high reset required to be asserted for 6 clock cycles of USER_CLK

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: tx_out_clk
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: tx_out_clk frequency depends on line rate

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: user_clk
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: user_clk frequency depends on line rate

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: sync_clk
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: sync_clk frequency depends on line rate and user_clk should be shorted with sync_clk

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: sys_reset_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: system reset available when shared logic is in IP

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_reset
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: GT reset sampled in INIT_CLK and asserted for 6 clock cycles and after assertion of reset

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_reset_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: GT reset generated when shared logic is in IP

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: link_reset_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Link reset is generated when IP is not receiving valid data for longer time

xilinx:isEnabled.xilinx:dependency: (((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.supportlevel'))=false) and (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.is_7series'))=true)) or ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="kintexu") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="virtexu") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="zynquplus") or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_FAMILY'))="kintexuplus")) or (spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.SINGLEEND_INITCLK'))=true))

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_refclk1_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: GT REFCLK1 when shared logic is in IP

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_refclk2_out
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: GT REFCLK2 when shared logic is in IP

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_refclk1
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: GT REFCLK1 when shared logic is in example design

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_refclk2
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: GT REFCLK2 when shared logic is in example design

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: GT_DIFF_REFCLK1
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Differential GT REFCLK1 and depends on line rate

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: GT_DIFF_REFCLK2
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Differential GT REFCLK2 and depends on line rate

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: rx_system_reset
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Aurora IP reset for Simplex-RX config

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: tx_system_reset
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Aurora IP reset for Simplex-TX config

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: RX_SIDEBAND_SIGNALS
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: RX SIDEBAND Signals must be connected with TX_SIDEBAND_SIGNALS

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: GT_SERIAL_TX
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Serial GT Transceiver TX Pins interface

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: GT_SERIAL_RX
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Serial GT Transceiver RX Pins interface

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: QPLL_CONTROL_IN
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Clock inputs generated by active transceiver quad

spirit:component.spirit:description: Customizable multi-lane gigabit serial link implementing the Aurora 8B10B protocol

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_START_QUAD
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Select the quad from which lane assignment begins

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_START_LANE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Select the starting lane location.Lane Assignment will begin from this Lane of the Quad selected earlier.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: INS_LOSS_NYQ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Indicate the transmitter to receiver insertion loss at the Nyquist frequency, in dB

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RX_EQ_MODE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Specify the equalization mode, or allow the core to select a mode. Refer to the product guide for guidelines on selecting between DFE and LPM modes.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RX_TERMINATION_PROG_VALUE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Select the termination voltage (in mV) when in programmable mode

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: RX_PPM_OFFSET
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: PPM offset between receiver and transmitter
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Specify the PPM offset between received data and transmitted data
